MR No. 626 - Counsel Concerning Adventists and Politics

     We have no more strength and grace given us than we can wisely appropriate. If God has a work for any of His commandment-keeping people to do in regard to politics, reach the position and do the work with your arm linked in the arm of Christ. The salvation of your souls should be your greatest study.--Letter 4, 1898, p. 13. (To "My Brethren," February 20, 1898.) 

Released June 21, 1978.
